definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Self-timer 10-second delay, for taking group photos or self-portraits.
sentences.chinese: 自拍10秒延遲採取組照片或自畫像。

sentences.english: The second chapter limits and the explanation self-portrait produce inevitability.
sentences.chinese: 第二章界定和解讀“自畫像”產生的必然性。

sentences.english: They are also all thinly veiled self-portraits.
sentences.chinese: 他們也都幾乎沒有遮掩的自畫像。

sentences.english: When I was 5 years old, I drew a self-portrait in school.
sentences.chinese: 當我5歲讀書的時候，我畫了一張自畫像。

sentences.english: As a type of painting, self-portrait came into being in the Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 自畫像作爲一個畫種在文藝復興時期誕生了。

sentences.english: This is evident in his masterful self-portrait from 1658.
sentences.chinese: 這些都體現在他1658年創作的大師級自畫像。

sentences.english: I still have an interesting self-portrait I painted in elementary school.
sentences.chinese: 我還留著一張小學時畫的有趣的自畫像。

sentences.english: One of the paintings appears to be Hitler's self-portrait.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅被疑是希特勒的自畫像。

sentences.english: I framed my portrait and hung it in my room.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的自畫像裝框掛房間裏。

sentences.english: Alongside this authentic self-portrait is an imposter.
sentences.chinese: 比方說這幅自畫像旁邊的那副就是假的。

sentences.english: The flowers simultaneously seem to be dead and loom ominously over a diminutive, standing self-portrait.
sentences.chinese: 垂死的花朵隱隱在一幅站着的小型自畫像上方出現。

sentences.english: When I painted it, I didn't look either at myself in the mirror or at the bird.
sentences.chinese: 我繪製自畫像的時候，沒有看鏡中的自己或者是雉雞。

sentences.english: Self-portrait of a quite different art.
sentences.chinese: 真的很不一樣的藝術風格的自畫像。

sentences.english: Digging that fourth chapter self-portrait value face tier.
sentences.chinese: 第四章“自畫像”價值層面的開掘。

sentences.english: The western painter's self-portrait establishes a new school in the world art painting world.
sentences.chinese: 西方畫家的自畫像在世界藝術畫壇中獨樹一幟。

sentences.english: Third chapter explanation self-portrait work in different time performance and function.
sentences.chinese: 第三章解讀自畫像作品在不同時期的表現和作用。

definition: portrait/to do a portrait of sb
Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter
